name: manly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the qualities that people think a man should have: He has such a manly voice. My mother used to tell me it wasn't manly for little boys to cry. Synonyms
masculine (MALE)
virile (MAN) approving
Related word
manliness noun
Add to word list
Add to word list
having qualities such as strength and bravery that people think a man should have: The boy was told that it wasn’t manly to cry.
